item.description:
"It’s a Wonderful Life" is a beloved Christmas movie, but it’s so much more. A moving examination of the worth of a single man’s life, it’s dark and bright, full of passion, despair and joy.
A Christmas Classic see it on the big screen along with a Mimosa or Hot Chocolate. This will be a nice way to spend some quiet time during all the hustle and bustle of the holidays, afterward join us for lunch at one of the nearby restaurants.

Movie starts at 11:00 am, meet us at the door at 10:45 a.m.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Movie and Mimosas - It's A Wonderful Life
